REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f8135 reute d f BC-ANIMED-<VETS>-EXPECTS 03-18 0047

TEXT.TITLE: ANIMED <VETS> EXPECTS TO TURN PROFITABLE
TEXT.BODY: ANIMED Inc said it expects to return to profitability during the current year. Today it reported a loss for the first quarter ended in January of 368,188 dlrs compared with a 149,334 dlr profit a year before. Reuter
